name: College Sex - Episode 3
description:
A visual novel series about the sex lives of two college girls. In this episode, one of them invites her boyfriend over to have some fun together.

GAME DESCRIPTION
College Sex is a new visual novel series that follows the story of two attractive young women and their naughty experiences in college.

Ivy openly asks Jade if it's okay for Simon to pay them a visit.
Not knowing how to react after what happened, she avoids the conversation and awkwardly leaves the room.
After getting out of the shower, Jade catches Ivy and Simon having sex and is asked something unexpected.

What follows after that… we leave it to you to discover!
We promise you a steamy story with high-definitions graphics and realistic-looking characters.
